fields.name: Nuclear Fission (Passive):
fields.value: All players of your alignment have unlimited charge/unlimited ammo for all of their abilities for as long as you are alive.

fields.name: Cold Fusion (Locked, Passive):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. All players of your alignment immediately unlock all of their abilities for as long as you are alive.

fields.name: Radiation:
fields.value: Each night you will be informed of one random ability possessed by another player of your alignment, alive or dead. If the ability is an attack with no power specified, your attack power is 0.9x. You may use this ability tonight only.
